body: Does "Ready for PR" imply someone is to write something?  What is the current status?

> Does "Ready for PR" imply someone is to write something? What is the current status?  Yes exactly, that's the intention of the "Ready for PR" label. Currently @mccown is assigned to this. I imagine that this issue here and #18 could probably be addressed in a single PR.

This was discussed during the [did meeting on 14 November 2024](https://www.w3.org/2024/11/14-did-minutes.html#78c8).
View the transcript
